backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, access control, and blob storage integration with numerous record types and state maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old chatroom records to a new format by making media fields optional and returning an updated map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI change about media-optional chatroom creation to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing structure, behavior, and recent UI or logic changes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React entrypoint with cache‑busting parameters and mobile viewport settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout with header/footer rules, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting, uploading, searching, or removing user avatars with Giphy integration and image upload support.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat interface handling message loading, auto‑scrolling, sending, replies, pinned video, and collapsible header behavior.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with media thumbnails, Twitch/Twitter previews, and click handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal for creating chatrooms with fields for topic, description, category, and media upload or URL validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with app branding, back navigation, and username/avatar editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component since authentication is disabled.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with reactions, media embeds, replies, and pin/unpin actions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Input box for sending messages with image upload, video/Twitter URL validation, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows the currently pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synchronized state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures chatroom data is freshly refetched when the actor becomes ready by purging outdated cache entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, persistence, and auth-client management via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines chatroom, message, and profile queries/mutations, including search and image compression helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables, layout rules, mobile input fixes, and voice message slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides compact number formatting (k, M, B) utility.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy, mapping API results to a simplified GIF object format with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image compression with resizing, quality control, progress callbacks, and fallbacks when compression fails.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to build lightweight preview objects with caching and duplicate‑request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter previews with validation, versioning, expiration, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts IDs and generates thumbnail or embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter links with multiple format handlers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin UI for authenticating with a hardcoded password and managing chatrooms, including fetching, filtering, and deletion workflows.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a chatroom by ID, handles loading and error states, increments view count, and renders ChatArea once data is loaded.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Shows searchable and filterable chatroom list, manages category/search filters, and navigates to selected chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, architectural constraints, known issues, and pending backend fix requirements.
